mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.category, s.name, s.comment, s.address, s.tel, s.owner_name, s.is_active, s.image_path, u.phone, u.email FROM stores s JOIN users u ON u.id = s.user_id WHERE s.id = #{storeId}
